message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I believe the product's value is closer to my initial offer. How about we meet in the middle at $1,000,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
